DOC.brief_title: Evaluation New Custom Made Hearing Product Technology Shell Modification
DOC.detailed_description: This control , single blind comparative study conduct monocentric Phonak Headquarters Staefa . The purpose study evaluate strength weaknesses new custom product development comparison existing/old product . The result promote custom product development , provide maximum benefit wear comfort hearing aid user .
DOC.criteria: Only adult participant 18 99 year lnformed Consent document signature ( Appendix lnformed Consent Form ) Ability fill questionnaire conscientious Healthy outer ear ( w/o previous surgical procedure ) Contraindications MD study , e.g . know hypersensitivity allergy investigational product , Limited mobility position attend weekly appointment Limited ability describe listen impressions/experiences use hear aid lnability produce reliable hear test result pure tone audiometry attempt audiologist Massively limited dexterity Psychological problem Central hear problem
